languages.text: "Отпусти ему сей грех, эттфатер. Если целитель не спасет его, так пусть ступает к Всеотцу без бремени. Слуга над казной славно проявил себя, не пожалел жизни, и не его вина, что он не был рожден воином, способным поднести тебе голову врага".

traits.locale_text: "Отпусти ему сей грех, эттфатер. Если целитель не спасет его, так пусть ступает к Всеотцу без бремени. Слуга над казной славно проявил себя, не пожалел жизни, и не его вина, что он не был рожден воином, способным поднести тебе голову врага".

languages.text: "Pardon him this failure, Aett-Vater. If the healer cannot save him, then let him go to the Allfather with no burdens. The coffer keeper stood valiantly, willing to offer his life, and it is no fault of his that he was not born a warrior who could bring you the enemy's head."
languages.original_text: "Отпусти ему сей грех, эттфатер. Если целитель не спасет его, так пусть ступает к Всеотцу без бремени. Слуга над казной славно проявил себя, не пожалел жизни, и не его вина, что он не был рожден воином, способным поднести тебе голову врага".

traits.locale_text: "Pardon him this failure, Aett-Vater. If the healer cannot save him, then let him go to the Allfather with no burdens. The coffer keeper stood valiantly, willing to offer his life, and it is no fault of his that he was not born a warrior who could bring you the enemy's head."

"Pardon him this failure, Aett-Vater. If the healer cannot save him, then let him go to the Allfather with no burdens. The coffer keeper stood valiantly, willing to offer his life, and it is no fault of his that he was not born a warrior who could bring you the enemy's head."

"Pardon him this failure, Aett-Vater. If the healer cannot save him, then let him go to the Allfather with no burdens. The coffer keeper stood valiantly, willing to offer his life, and it is no fault of his that he was not born a warrior who could bring you the enemy's head."

"Pardon him this failure, Aett-Vater. If the healer cannot save him, then let him go to the Allfather with no burdens. The coffer keeper stood valiantly, willing to offer his life, and it is no fault of his that he was not born a warrior who could bring you the enemy's head."

"Pardon him this failure, Aett-Vater. If the healer cannot save him, then let him go to the Allfather with no burdens. The coffer keeper stood valiantly, willing to offer his life, and it is no fault of his that he was not born a warrior who could bring you the enemy's head."

"Pardon him this failure, Aett-Vater. If the healer cannot save him, then let him go to the Allfather with no burdens. The coffer keeper stood valiantly, willing to offer his life, and it is no fault of his that he was not born a warrior who could bring you the enemy's head."

languages.text: «Perdónele por este error, Aett-Vater. Si el sanador no puede salvarlo, que vaya con el Padre de todas las cosas sin peso sobre sus hombros. El guardián del cofre resistió con valentía, dispuesto a ofrecer su vida, y no es culpa suya no haber nacido un guerrero que pudiera traerle la cabeza del enemigo».
languages.original_text: "Pardon him this failure, Aett-Vater. If the healer cannot save him, then let him go to the Allfather with no burdens. The coffer keeper stood valiantly, willing to offer his life, and it is no fault of his that he was not born a warrior who could bring you the enemy's head."

traits.locale_text: «Perdónele por este error, Aett-Vater. Si el sanador no puede salvarlo, que vaya con el Padre de todas las cosas sin peso sobre sus hombros. El guardián del cofre resistió con valentía, dispuesto a ofrecer su vida, y no es culpa suya no haber nacido un guerrero que pudiera traerle la cabeza del enemigo».

languages.text: 「この失敗を許してやってくれ、アエット＝ヴァテル。治療師が彼を救えないのなら、重荷を背負わせることなく、全知の父のもとへ行かせようではないか。この金庫番は勇敢に立ち向かい、命を捧げた。敵の首を刎ねられるような戦士に生まれてこなかったのは、彼の過ちではない」
languages.original_text: "Pardon him this failure, Aett-Vater. If the healer cannot save him, then let him go to the Allfather with no burdens. The coffer keeper stood valiantly, willing to offer his life, and it is no fault of his that he was not born a warrior who could bring you the enemy's head."

traits.locale_text: 「この失敗を許してやってくれ、アエット＝ヴァテル。治療師が彼を救えないのなら、重荷を背負わせることなく、全知の父のもとへ行かせようではないか。この金庫番は勇敢に立ち向かい、命を捧げた。敵の首を刎ねられるような戦士に生まれてこなかったのは、彼の過ちではない」

languages.text: “原谅他的失败吧，狼领。如果治疗师救不了他的性命，就让他毫无负担地回到全父面前吧。金库的保管员不惜牺牲自己的性命，也要勇敢地挡在敌人前面。他生来不是战士，他的责任也不是砍掉敌人的脑袋，这不是他的错。”
languages.original_text: "Pardon him this failure, Aett-Vater. If the healer cannot save him, then let him go to the Allfather with no burdens. The coffer keeper stood valiantly, willing to offer his life, and it is no fault of his that he was not born a warrior who could bring you the enemy's head."

traits.locale_text: “原谅他的失败吧，狼领。如果治疗师救不了他的性命，就让他毫无负担地回到全父面前吧。金库的保管员不惜牺牲自己的性命，也要勇敢地挡在敌人前面。他生来不是战士，他的责任也不是砍掉敌人的脑袋，这不是他的错。”

languages.text: "Ihr müsst ihm vergeben, Aett-Vater. Wenn ihn der Heiler nicht retten kann, lasst ihn bar jeder Last zum Allvater gehen. Der Kassenhüter war mutig bereit, sein Leben zu opfern, und es ist nicht sein Fehler, dass er nicht als Krieger geboren wurde, der Euch den Kopf des Feindes hätte bringen können."
languages.original_text: "Pardon him this failure, Aett-Vater. If the healer cannot save him, then let him go to the Allfather with no burdens. The coffer keeper stood valiantly, willing to offer his life, and it is no fault of his that he was not born a warrior who could bring you the enemy's head."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst ihm vergeben, Aett-Vater. Wenn ihn der Heiler nicht retten kann, lasst ihn bar jeder Last zum Allvater gehen. Der Kassenhüter war mutig bereit, sein Leben zu opfern, und es ist nicht sein Fehler, dass er nicht als Krieger geboren wurde, der Euch den Kopf des Feindes hätte bringen können."

languages.text: « Pardonnez-lui cet échec, aett-vater. S'il ne peut pas être sauvé, laissez-le se présenter libre de tout fardeau devant le Père de Tous. Le gardien a fait preuve de courage. Il était prêt à donner sa vie, et on ne peut lui reprocher de ne pas avoir été un guerrier capable de vous rapporter la tête de votre ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "Pardon him this failure, Aett-Vater. If the healer cannot save him, then let him go to the Allfather with no burdens. The coffer keeper stood valiantly, willing to offer his life, and it is no fault of his that he was not born a warrior who could bring you the enemy's head."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-lui cet échec, aett-vater. S'il ne peut pas être sauvé, laissez-le se présenter libre de tout fardeau devant le Père de Tous. Le gardien a fait preuve de courage. Il était prêt à donner sa vie, et on ne peut lui reprocher de ne pas avoir été un guerrier capable de vous rapporter la tête de votre ennemi. »
